languages.text: {n}Помолчав, Иеронимус мрачно добавляет:{/n} "Впрочем, все это — лишь слова. Настоящая Экклезиархия куда страшнее, грязнее и мрачнее, чем когда-то была".

traits.locale_text: {n}Помолчав, Иеронимус мрачно добавляет:{/n} "Впрочем, все это — лишь слова. Настоящая Экклезиархия куда страшнее, грязнее и мрачнее, чем когда-то была".

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."
languages.original_text: {n}Помолчав, Иеронимус мрачно добавляет:{/n} "Впрочем, все это — лишь слова. Настоящая Экклезиархия куда страшнее, грязнее и мрачнее, чем когда-то была".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronimus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."
{n}Hieronimus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."
{n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."
{n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."
{n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯顿了顿，之后阴沉地补充道。{/n}“不过，这些事情都只是说说而已。国教真正的面貌，比以往更加可怕、更加卑鄙、更加阴暗。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯顿了顿，之后阴沉地补充道。{/n}“不过，这些事情都只是说说而已。国教真正的面貌，比以往更加可怕、更加卑鄙、更加阴暗。”

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus se detiene para añadir con tristeza:{/n} «Aunque no son más que palabras, la verdadera Eclesiarquía es mucho más aterradora, vil y siniestra de lo que era en otros tiempos».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus se detiene para añadir con tristeza:{/n} «Aunque no son más que palabras, la verdadera Eclesiarquía es mucho más aterradora, vil y siniestra de lo que era en otros tiempos».

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは話をやめ、厳しい声で付け加えた。{/n}「ですが、実体は違います。真の帝国聖教会は、かつてよりさらに恐ろしく、下劣で、邪悪なのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは話をやめ、厳しい声で付け加えた。{/n}「ですが、実体は違います。真の帝国聖教会は、かつてよりさらに恐ろしく、下劣で、邪悪なのです」

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus macht eine Pause und fügt dann grimmig hinzu:{/n} "Aber das sind alles nur Worte. Die wahre Ekklesiarchie ist weitaus furchteinflößender, böser und dunkler als früher."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus macht eine Pause und fügt dann grimmig hinzu:{/n} "Aber das sind alles nur Worte. Die wahre Ekklesiarchie ist weitaus furchteinflößender, böser und dunkler als früher."

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus s'interrompt, avant d'ajouter d'un ton sombre :{/n} « Néanmoins, ce ne sont là que des mots. La véritable Ecclésiarchie d'aujourd'hui est bien plus effrayante, infâme et sombre qu'autrefois. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus s'interrompt, avant d'ajouter d'un ton sombre :{/n} « Néanmoins, ce ne sont là que des mots. La véritable Ecclésiarchie d'aujourd'hui est bien plus effrayante, infâme et sombre qu'autrefois. »

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus duraksayıp ardından tatsız bir şekilde ekliyor.{/n} "Tabii bunlar hep lafügüzaf. Gerçek Ekleşiarşi, eski hâlinden çok daha korkutucu, kötü ve karanlık."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus pauses, then adds grimly,{/n} "However, these are nothing but words. The real Ecclesiarchy is far more frightening, vile, and dark than it once was."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus duraksıyor ve tatsız bir şekilde ekliyor:{/n} "Bunlar laftan başka bir şey değil ama. Gerçek Ekleşiarşi, bir zamanlar olduğu şeyden çok daha korkutucu, kötü ve karanlık."
